thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Tony Bopp
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Tony Bopp

author: Tony Bopp
title: Tony Bopp
text:
Lately I ordrered more than 10 products with them and I'm very satisfied. Few sellers like them can send to my remote island called New Caledonia, and they do with unbeatable offer including tracking and insurance! Great.
Sending is pretty quick. Product quality is better than expected for the price. They and nice point redeem program for regular buyers.
Only one electronic device was not completly working and aftersale customer service offered me refund very quickly.
I just hope they keep going like this!
RECOMMANDED
